6.7.7 OLE API hooks

server-IOleObject

Function

Signature

server-IOleObject obj => value

Arguments

obj
An instance of your subclass of <ole-server-framework> or <ole-in-process-server>.

Values

value
An instance of <IPOleObject>.

Library

OLE-Server

Module

OLE-Server

Description

Returns the server object's IOleObject interface pointer, an instance of <IOleObject>.

Note that this function does not call AddRef on the returned value.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
